title: Full Stack Developer
short_description:
I am a full stack developer. I make websites and stuff. Mostly websites, though.

Over the last three and a half or so years, I've had the opportunity to work professionally in a variety of different positions, giving me vital insights to the full scope of the development process.

I've had the chance to work on many cool projects, building browser and device-friendly, responsive websites using modern methodologies and applying web standards.
